description.english: Attempted to break into every caravan in Lakeside Holiday Camp
description.german: Versucht, in jeden Wohnwagen im Lakeside-Feriencamp einzubrechen.
description.french: Vous avez essayé d'entrer dans toutes les caravanes au camp de vacances de Lakeside.
description.italian: Hai provato a intrufolarti in tutti i caravan del campeggio di Lakeside
description.koreana: 레이크사이드 홀리데이 캠프장에 있는 모든 카라반에 침입 시도를 하였습니다.
description.spanish: Has intentado entrar en todas las caravanas del camping de verano de Lakeside.
description.tchinese: 嘗試闖入湖畔渡假營地的每一台露營車
description.russian: Попытались проникнуть в каждый трейлер в лагере.
description.japanese: ホリデイキャンプのすべてのトレーラーに入ろうとする
description.portuguese: Tentaste entrar em todas as caravanas no Lakeside Holiday Camp.
description.polish: Spróbowałeś się włamać do każdej przyczepy na kempingu Lakeside.
description.danish: Forsøgte at bryde ind i alle campingvogne i Lakeside Holiday Camp
description.dutch: Je hebt geprobeerd in te breken in elke caravan in Lakeside Holiday Camp
description.finnish: Yritä murtautua kaikkiin asuntovaunuihin Lakeside Holiday Campissa
description.norwegian: Forsøkte å bryte deg inn i alle campingvogner på Lakeside-ferieleiren
description.swedish: Försökte bryta dig in i alla husvagnar på Lakeside Holiday Camp
description.brazilian: Tentou invadir todos os trailers no Acampamento de Lakeside

description.english: Spent time waiting for a call
description.german: Zeit damit verbracht, auf einen Anruf zu warten.
description.italian: Hai passato del tempo ad aspettare una telefonata
description.spanish: Has estado un rato esperando una llamada.
description.japanese: 電話が来るのを待って時間を過ごす
description.portuguese: Ficaste à espera de uma chamada.
description.polish: Spędziłeś jakiś czas, czekając na telefon.
description.danish: Brugte tid på at vente på et opkald
description.dutch: Je hebt gewacht op een telefoontje
description.norwegian: Brukte tid på å vente på en samtale
description.brazilian: Passou um tempo esperando uma ligação

description.english: Triggered all of the story in the game
description.german: Im Spiel alle Teile der Geschichte ausgelöst.
description.french: Vous avez déclenché toute l'histoire dans le jeu.
description.italian: Hai scoperto tutti gli elementi della storia
description.spanish: Has activado toda la historia del juego.
description.tchinese: 觸發遊戲中所有的故事
description.japanese: すべてのストーリーを発生させる
description.portuguese: Ativaste todas as histórias no jogo.
description.polish: Ukończyłeś wszystkie elementy fabularne w grze.
description.dutch: Je hebt de volledige verhaallijn gespeeld
description.finnish: Käy läpi kaikki pelin tarinan osat
description.brazilian: Acionou toda a história do jogo

displayName.japanese: グラフィティアーテイスト

description.french: Vous avez trouvé tous les graffitis du personnage caché.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i graffiti Kilroy was here
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los grafitis de caras.
description.japanese: すべてのキャラクターの落書きを見つける
description.brazilian: Encontrou todos os grafites de rostos

description.english: Read all of the Bittern books
description.french: Vous avez lu tous les livres des éditions Bittern.
description.italian: Hai letto tutti i libri della collana Bittern
description.spanish: Has leído todos los libros de Bittern.
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべてのBittern書籍を読む
description.portuguese: Leste todos os livros da Bittern.
description.brazilian: Leu todos os livros de Bittern

description.english: Listened to all the radios before doing anything else
description.german: Alle Radiosender gehört, bevor irgendetwas anderes erledigt wurde.
description.french: Vous avez écouté toutes les radios avant de faire autre chose.
description.italian: Hai ascoltato tutti i messaggi radio prima di ogni altra cosa
description.koreana: 행동을 취하기 전에 모든 라디오 방송을 청취하였습니다.
description.spanish: Has escuchado todas las radios antes de hacer cualquier otra cosa.
description.tchinese: 在做其他動作之前聽完全部的廣播
description.japanese: 何かする前にすべてのラジオを聞く
description.portuguese: Ouviste todos os rádios antes de tomar qualquer outra ação.
description.polish: Wysłuchałeś wszystkich audycji radiowych, zanim zrobiłeś cokolwiek innego.
description.danish: Lyttede til alle radioer, før du gjorde andet
description.dutch: Je hebt naar alle radio's geluisterd voordat je iets anders deed
description.finnish: Kuuntele jokaista radiota ennen kuin teet mitään muuta
description.norwegian: Hørte på alle radioene før du gjorde noe annet
description.swedish: Lyssnade på alla radiosändningar först av allt
description.brazilian: Ouviu todos os rádios antes de fazer outra coisa

description.english: Read all of the You Are Here maps
description.french: Vous avez consulté toutes les cartes
description.italian: Hai controllato tutte le mappe di posizione
description.spanish: Has leído todos los mapas de Está aquí.
description.tchinese: 閱讀所有現在位置告示牌
description.japanese: 現在地の地図をすべて確認する
description.norwegian: Sett på alle Du er her-kartene
description.brazilian: Leu todos os mapas do tipo Você Está Aqui

description.english: Spent time playing with Howard's train set
description.german: Zeit damit verbracht, mit Howards Modelleisenbahn zu spielen.
description.french: Vous avez joué avec le train d'Howard.
description.italian: Hai passato del tempo a giocare con il trenino di Howard
description.spanish: Has pasado tiempo jugando con el tren de Howard.
description.tchinese: 花時間玩霍華的小火車模型
description.japanese: ハワードの列車セットで遊ぶ
description.portuguese: Brincaste com o comboio do Howard.
description.polish: Spędziłeś nieco czasu, bawiąc się kolejką Howarda.
description.danish: Brugte tid på at lege med Howards togsæt
description.dutch: Je hebt gespeeld met de treintjes van Howard
description.norwegian: Brukte tid på å leke med Howards togsett
description.brazilian: Passou um tempo brincando com o trem do Howard

description.english: Noted all of the train numbers
description.french: Vous avez relevé tous les numéros de trains.
description.italian: Hai annotato tutti i numeri delle locomotive
description.spanish: Has anotado todos los números de trenes.
description.japanese: すべての列車の番号を確認する
description.portuguese: Apontaste os números de todos os comboios.
description.brazilian: Observou os números de todos os trens

description.english: Rode the Witches Hat for two minutes
description.german: Zwei Minuten auf dem Vogelnest-Karussell gefahren.
description.french: Vous avez joué sur le tourniquet pendant deux minutes.
description.italian: Hai passato due minuti sulla giostra a cono del parco giochi
description.spanish: Has montado en el columpio giratorio dos minutos.
description.tchinese: 搭旋轉架連續轉兩分鐘
description.japanese: 村の中央にある公園の遊具で2分以上遊ぶ
description.portuguese: Andaste no carrossel infantil durante dois minutos.
description.polish: Kręciłeś się na odwróconej karuzeli przez dwie minuty.
description.danish: Kørte rundt i karrusellen i to minutter
description.dutch: Je hebt twee minuten lang op het speeltoestel gezeten
description.norwegian: Satt på Heksehatten i to minutter
description.swedish: Åkte runt på karusellen i två minuter
description.brazilian: Ficou no gira-gira por dois minutos

description.english: Simulated walking backwards for fifty seconds
description.french: Vous avez fait semblant de marcher à reculons pendant cinquante secondes.
description.italian: Hai camminato all'indietro per cinquanta secondi
description.spanish: Has simulado andar hacia atrás durante 50 segundos.
description.tchinese: 模擬倒退走連續五十秒
description.portuguese: Simulaste caminhar para trás durante cinquenta segundos.
description.polish: Udawałeś, że idziesz do tyłu przez pięćdziesiąt sekund.
description.danish: Simulerede at gå baglæns i 50 sekunder
description.dutch: Je hebt vijftig seconden lang gedaan of je achteruitliep
description.norwegian: Simulert å ha gått baklengs i femti sekunder
description.swedish: Låtsades gå bakåt i femtio sekunder
description.brazilian: Simulou caminhar para trás por 50 segundos

description.english: Used the hidden paths to return to each area in the game
description.german: Auf versteckten Wegen in jedes Spielgebiet zurückgekehrt.
description.french: Vous avez utilisé les chemins cachés pour retourner dans chaque zone du jeu.
description.italian: Hai usato i sentieri nascosti per tornare in ogni area del gioco
description.koreana: 숨겨진 길을 이용하여 게임의 각 지역을 다시 방문하였습니다.
description.spanish: Has usado los caminos ocultos para volver a cada área del juego.
description.tchinese: 利用隱藏路線回到遊戲中每一個區域
description.russian: Возвращались в каждую область по секретному пути.
description.japanese: 隠された道を使って各エリアに戻る
description.portuguese: Usaste os caminhos escondidos para regressar a todas as áreas do jogo.
description.polish: Skorzystałeś z ukrytych ścieżek, aby wrócić do wszystkich obszarów w grze.
description.danish: Brugte de skjulte stier til at vende tilbage til hvert område i spillet
description.dutch: Je bent over de verborgen paden teruggegaan naar elk gebied in de game
description.finnish: Palaa pelin jokaiselle alueelle salaisia reittejä pitkin
description.norwegian: Brukte de skjulte stiene for å vende tilbake til hvert område i spillet
description.swedish: Använde de dolda stigarna för att återvända till alla områden i spelet
description.brazilian: Usou as trilhas secretas para voltar a todas as áreas do jogo

description.english: Reached Stephen's bunker without ending any other story arc
description.german: Stephens Bunker erreicht, ohne eine andere Geschichte abzuschließen.
description.french: Vous avez atteint le bunker de Stephen sans terminer aucune autre partie de l'histoire.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il bunker di Stephen senza terminare le altre storie
description.koreana: 다른 줄거리를 마무리하지 않은 상태로 스티븐의 벙커에 도착했습니다.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el búnker de Stephen sin terminar ningún otro arco argumental.
description.tchinese: 在結束任何故事章節之前抵達史蒂芬的燃料庫
description.russian: Нашли бункер Стивена, но не закрыли ни одну сюжетную линию.
description.japanese: 他のストーリーを終わらせずにスティーブンの貯蔵庫に辿り着く
description.portuguese: Chegaste ao bunker do Stephen sem terminar outro arco de história.
description.polish: Dotarłeś do bunkra Stephena, nie kończąc żadnego innego wątku fabularnego.
description.danish: Nåede frem til Stephens bunker uden at afslutte nogen anden historie
description.dutch: Je hebt de bunker van Stephen bereikt zonder een van de verhaallijnen te voltooien
description.finnish: Pääse Stephenin bunkkerille päättämättä muita tarinoita
description.norwegian: Nådd Stephens bunker uten å ende noen annen historiegren
description.swedish: Nådde Stephens bunker utan att ha avslutat någon annan berättelse
description.brazilian: Chegou ao abrigo antibombas do Stephen sem concluir outros arcos da história

description.english: Arrived and left Wade's surgery many, many times
description.german: Viele, viele Male Dr. Wades Praxis betreten und verlassen.
description.french: Vous avez visité le cabinet de Wade très, très souvent.
description.italian: Sei entrato e uscito più volte dall'ambulatorio di Wade
description.spanish: Has entrado y salido de la consulta de Wade muchas, muchas veces.
description.tchinese: 抵達魏德醫生的診所之後又離開，重複非常非常多次
description.russian: Много раз заглядывали в клинику Уэйда.
description.japanese: ウェードの診療所に何度も到着し立ち去る
description.portuguese: Entraste e saíste do consultório do Wade muitas, muitas vezes.
description.polish: Odwiedziłeś i opuściłeś przychodnię Wade'a, wiele, wiele razy.
description.danish: Besøgte og forlod Wades operationsstue mange, mange gange
description.dutch: Je hebt de praktijk van Wade heel vaak bezocht
description.finnish: Astu sisään Waden klinikalle ja lähde sieltä monen monta kertaa
description.norwegian: Ankom og forlot Wades operasjonssal mange, mange ganger
description.swedish: Har varit in och ut på Wades mottagning många, många gånger
description.brazilian: Entrou e saiu do consultório do Wade muitas e muitas vezes

description.english: Made some tasty meals using the power of nuclear energy
description.french: Vous avez préparé de bons repas grâce à l'énergie nucléaire.
description.italian: Hai preparato dei manicaretti usando l'energia nucleare
description.spanish: Has hecho una comida exquisita usando el poder de la energía nuclear.
description.tchinese: 利用微波的力量做一些好吃的餐點
description.russian: Готовили обеды при помощи ядерной энергии.
description.japanese: 原子力を使っておいしいごはんを作る
description.portuguese: Cozinhaste algumas refeições saborosas com energia nuclear.
description.polish: Przygotowałeś pyszne posiłki, korzystając z energii jądrowej.
description.danish: Lavede nogle lækre måltider ved hjælp af atomkraft
description.dutch: Je hebt lekkere maaltijden bereid met nucleaire energie
description.norwegian: Laget smakfulle måltider ved bruk av kjernekraft
description.swedish: Lagade några smaskiga måltider med hjälp av kärnkraftsenergi
description.brazilian: Fez refeições saborosas usando energia nuclear

description.english: Waited for a pint at The Stars and The Whistler
description.german: Im Stars und im Whistler auf ein Getränk gewartet.
description.french: Vous avez commandé une pinte à The Stars et The Whistler.
description.italian: Hai aspettato una birra al The Stars e al The Whistler
description.spanish: Has esperado una pinta en el Stars y el Whistler.
description.tchinese: 在 The Stars 和 The Whistler 酒吧等待啤酒送上
description.russian: Ждали, когда принесут пиво в местном баре.
description.japanese: The Stars At NightとThe Seventh Whistlerでビールが出てくるのを待つ
description.portuguese: Esperaste por uma cerveja no The Stars e no The Whistler.
description.polish: Czekałeś na kufel pod The Stars i The Whistler.
description.danish: Ventede på en pils på The Stars og The Whistler
description.dutch: Je hebt op je biertje gewacht bij The Stars en bij de The Whistler
description.finnish: Odota tuoppia The Stars- ja The Whistler -baareissa
description.norwegian: Ventet på en øl på The Stars og The Whistler
description.swedish: Väntade på en öl inne på The Stars och The Whistler
description.brazilian: Esperou uma bebida no Stars e no Whistler

description.english: Discovered the power of interactivity by doing nothing at all
description.german: Die Macht der Interaktivität im Nichtstun entdeckt.
description.french: Vous avez découvert le pouvoir de l'interactivité en ne faisant rien du tout.
description.italian: Hai scoperto l'interattività senza fare assolutamente nulla
description.koreana: 아무 행동도 취하지 않음을 통해 교류의 힘을 발견했습니다.
description.spanish: Has descubierto el poder de la interactividad sin hacer nada.
description.tchinese: 藉由什麼都不做，發掘出互動的潛力
description.russian: Познали силу интерактивности, не делая вообще ничего.
description.japanese: 何もせずにインタラクティブの影響力を発見する
description.portuguese: Descobriste o poder da interatividade ao não fazer absolutamente nada.
description.polish: Odkryłeś moc interakcji, nie robiąc zupełnie nic.
description.danish: Opdagede interaktivitetens kraft ved at lave absolut ingenting
description.dutch: Je hebt de kracht van interactiviteit ontdekt door helemaal niks te doen
description.finnish: Todista vuorovaikutuksen mahti tekemättä yhtään mitään
description.norwegian: Oppdaget kraften av interaktivitet ved å ikke gjøre noe som helst
description.swedish: Upptäckte inaktivitetens kraft genom att inte göra något alls
description.brazilian: Descobriu o poder da interatividade fazendo nada
